member_organisations:
The Advisory Board is the private advisory of the institute of global transformation.  The meetings with varying advisors are in un-conferencing style focused on forward movement. It has four main routes; share our experiences from our projects, share academic visions, share the vision of senior professionals cross-profiling in areas of expertise and share our ethics. The innovative and strategic planning of future events are held in quartily meetings with the president and 8 nominee counselors on various topics: 
 
  
 
Counselor of Economics 
 
Counselor  of Politics 
 
Counselor of Culture 
 
Counselor of Education 
 
Counselor of Technical enhancement 
 
Counselor of Science 
 
Counselor of History 
 
Counselor of Technology and Construction  
 
-----

section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
goals__remit: The Institute of global transformation is a social innovation club working on global transformation. We build open space to philosophize on transformation and to share our wisdom on various topics. This international network is based on swarm intelligence and co-creates in many different ways. Our mission of our journeys is to share our experience, social capital, materials and access, to facilitate a better future for us all.
